00429 inline StringTable::stringCode 
00430 Connection::getTurnStringCode() const
00431 {
00432    switch (m_turnDirection) {
00433       case ItemTypes::UNDEFINED :
00434          return (StringTable::UNDEFINED_TURN);
00435          break;
00436       case ItemTypes::LEFT :
00437          return (StringTable::LEFT_TURN);
00438          break;
00439       case ItemTypes::AHEAD :
00440          return (StringTable::AHEAD_TURN);
00441          break;
00442       case ItemTypes::RIGHT :
00443          return (StringTable::RIGHT_TURN);
00444          break;
00445       case ItemTypes::UTURN :
00446          return (StringTable::U_TURN);
00447          break;
00448       case ItemTypes::FOLLOWROAD :
00449          return (StringTable::FOLLOWROAD_TURN);
00450          break;
00451       case ItemTypes::ENTER_ROUNDABOUT :
00452          return (StringTable::ENTER_ROUNDABOUT_TURN);
00453          break;
00454       case ItemTypes::EXIT_ROUNDABOUT :
00455          return (StringTable::EXIT_ROUNDABOUT_TURN);
00456          break;
00457       case ItemTypes::RIGHT_ROUNDABOUT :
00458          return (StringTable::RIGHT_ROUNDABOUT_TURN);
00459          break;
00460       case ItemTypes::LEFT_ROUNDABOUT :
00461          return (StringTable::LEFT_ROUNDABOUT_TURN);
00462          break;
00463       case ItemTypes::AHEAD_ROUNDABOUT :
00464          return (StringTable::AHEAD_ROUNDABOUT_TURN);
00465          break;
00466       case ItemTypes::ON_RAMP :
00467          return (StringTable::ON_RAMP_TURN);
00468          break;
00469       case ItemTypes::OFF_RAMP :
00470          return (StringTable::OFF_RAMP_TURN);
00471          break;
00472       case ItemTypes::OFF_RAMP_LEFT :
00473          return (StringTable::LEFT_OFF_RAMP_TURN);
00474          break;
00475       case ItemTypes::OFF_RAMP_RIGHT :
00476          return (StringTable::RIGHT_OFF_RAMP_TURN);
00477          break;
00478       case ItemTypes::ENTER_BUS:
00479          return (StringTable::ENTER_BUS_TURN);
00480          break;
00481       case ItemTypes::EXIT_BUS :
00482          return (StringTable::EXIT_BUS_TURN);
00483          break;
00484       case ItemTypes::CHANGE_BUS :
00485          return (StringTable::CHANGE_BUS_TURN);
00486          break;
00487       case ItemTypes::KEEP_LEFT :
00488          return (StringTable::KEEP_LEFT);
00489          break;
00490       case ItemTypes::KEEP_RIGHT :
00491          return (StringTable::KEEP_RIGHT);
00492          break;   
00493       case ItemTypes::ENTER_FERRY:
00494          return (StringTable::ENTER_FERRY_TURN);
00495          break;
00496       case ItemTypes::EXIT_FERRY :
00497          return (StringTable::EXIT_FERRY_TURN);
00498          break;
00499       case ItemTypes::CHANGE_FERRY :
00500          return (StringTable::CHANGE_FERRY_TURN);
00501          break;
00502       case ItemTypes::MULTI_CONNECTION_TURN :
00503          return (StringTable::NOSTRING);
00504          break;
00505    }
00506    return (StringTable::NOSTRING);  // To make compiler happy...
00507 }

00546 inline double
00547 Connection::timeCostToSec(double timeCost)
00548 {
00549    return double(timeCost) / double(Connection::NORMAL_SPEED_MS);
00550 }
00551 
00552 inline double
00553 Connection::secToTimeCost(double seconds)
00554 {
00555    return double(seconds) * Connection::NORMAL_SPEED_MS;
00556 
00557 }
00558

00563 }

00571 inline uint32
00572 Connection::timeCostToSec(uint32 timeCost)
00573 {
00574    return uint32(rint(timeCostToSec(double(timeCost))));
00575 }

00578 Connection::secToTimeCost(uint32 seconds)

00595 inline bool
00596 Connection::isMultiConnection() const
00597 {
00598    return  ( m_turnDirection == ItemTypes::MULTI_CONNECTION_TURN );
00599 }
